org.sat4j.specs
インタフェース Propagatable

既知の実装クラスの一覧:
AtLeast, BinaryClause, HTClause, LearntBinaryClause, LearntHTClause, LearntWLClause, MaxWatchCard, MinWatchCard, OriginalBinaryClause, OriginalHTClause, OriginalWLClause, WLClause
public interface Propagatable

This interface is to be implemented by the classes wanted to be notified of the falsification of a literal. That interface was moved here from org.sat4j.minisat.core package in release 2.3.6 to avoid cyclic dependencies with org.sat4j.specs.

作成者:
leberre

メソッドの概要
 boolean propagate(UnitPropagationListener s, int p)
          Propagate the truth value of a literal in constraints in which that literal is falsified.
 boolean propagatePI(MandatoryLiteralListener l, int p)
          Specific procedure for computing the prime implicants of a formula.
 Constr toConstraint()
          Allow to access a constraint view of the propagatable to avoid casting.
 

メソッドの詳細

propagate

boolean propagate(UnitPropagationListener s,
                  int p)
Propagate the truth value of a literal in constraints in which that literal is falsified.

パラメータ:
s - something able to perform unit propagation
p - the literal being propagated. Its negation must appear in the constraint.
戻り値:
false iff an inconsistency (a contradiction) is detected.

propagatePI

boolean propagatePI(MandatoryLiteralListener l,
                    int p)
Specific procedure for computing the prime implicants of a formula.

パラメータ:
l - an object to gather mandatory literals.
p - the falsified literal
戻り値:
導入されたバージョン:
2.3.6

toConstraint

Constr toConstraint()
Allow to access a constraint view of the propagatable to avoid casting. In most cases, the constraint will implement directly propagatable thus will return itself. It will also also the implementation of more sophisticated watching strategy.

戻り値:
the constraint associated to that propagatable.
導入されたバージョン:
2.3.2
